LanguageData.MousekinRace_Beehive_HoneyPausedNotEnoug: Paused: Not enough flowers in range ({0} of {1} required).
LanguageData.MousekinRace_Beehive_Instructions: To produce honey and beeswax, the Mousekin beehive must be at a temperature range of {0} ~ {1} and within range of at least {2} cells containing any of the following flowers:\n
LanguageData.MousekinRace_CellarOutdoor_ContainedItem: The items currently stored inside this root cellar.
LanguageData.MousekinRace_CellarOutdoor_EjectItemTool: Remove this item from the root cellar.
LanguageData.MousekinRace_CheesePress_StartInsertionM: Bring milk to the cheese press to start the cheesemaking process
LanguageData.MousekinRace_CheesePress_CancelBringingM: Cancel ringing Milk to the cheese press.
LanguageData.MousekinRace_FermentingBarrel_StartInser: Bring mead must or lager wort to the barrel to start fermentation process
LanguageData.MousekinRace_FermentingBarrel_CancelBrin: Cancel bringing mead must or lager wort to the barrel.
LanguageData.MousekinRace_PlaceWorker_OnlyOnePerMap: Cannot build more than one {0} on the map.
LanguageData.MousekinRace_PlaceWorker_MustBeAwayFromO: {0} must be placed at least {1} cells away from any impassable structures.
{0} must be placed at least {1} cells away from any other {0}s.
LanguageData.MousekinRace_PlaceWorker_MustBeClearOfOb: {0} must be placed clear of any obstructions.
LanguageData.MousekinRace_Windmill_StartInsertionWhea: Bring raw wheat to the windmill for milling into flour
LanguageData.MousekinRace_Windmill_CancelBringingWhea: Cancel rining raw wheat to the windmill
LanguageData.MousekinRace_GameOver_RoyalAscent_Depart: But as for the Mousekins amongst the departing colonists, they will soon discover that regardless of noble title, the Empire extends no such courtesies to lesser races like them, and they will spend the rest of their days as glorified circus animals and "talking pets" performing for the amusement of the Imperial court.\n\nSuch is the fate of mice who naively believe in the lies of men.
